Paragraph encoded at the Alphabetic Layer only.
Paragraph encoded at the Alphabetic Layer, main variants only.
This is the OCR-ed text from Garufi: the collation on the manuscript has not yet been done.

quotation.p: The manuscript does not have quotation marks. Some passages (direct speech or epistle quotations) are marked up with 'said', without quotation marks.

Quotations from literary works are marked up with 'quote'. When present, @type="biblia" means that it is a biblical quote, according to the "Manuale di codifica dei testi ALIM in TEI XML" in http://it.alim.unisi.it/documentazione/. @type="liturgia" means that the quote comes from the Catholic liturgy.

namespace.name: http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0

list.item: When it has @type="subst" (and it is child of 'subst' and sibling of 'del') it is meant to substitute the textual portion marked with 'del'. Otherwise, it represents an addition to the text.
If no @hand attribute is provided, it is implied that the the main hand of the manuscript is responsible for the textual modification. If another hand is responsible, a @hand attribute is provided.

namespace.tagUsage:
See above the note on the usage of 'link'. Like 'link', also 'anchor' has @type="transposition". Element 'anchor' has the same values of @subtype as the 'link' that points to it: it marks the point of the text at which a paragraph is collocated
by both the editions of Garufi and Bonetti (if @subtype="garufiandbonetticollocation"),
by Garufi only (if @subtype="garuficollocation"), or
by Bonetti only (if @subtype="bonetticollocation")

list.item: It is used either alone for a passage deleted and not substituted by the scribe,or in combination with 'subst' and 'add'.

Possible values for @rend: "rasura", "strikeout"; when used with 'subst' and 'add', also "metamark" (when a scribe wrote a metamark such as an asterisk above the original text as a pointer towards a correction added in margin), "nomark" (when the correction is simply rewritten on the original glyphs or the correction is made by deleting a part of a glyph), and "glyphmodification" (when a scribe transforms a glyph to another glyph by erasing a part of it).
If no @hand attribute is provided, it is implied that the the main hand of the manuscript is responsible for the textual modification. If another hand is responsible, a @hand attribute is provided.

namespace.tagUsage: Used to mark up words capitalized in the print edition, but not constituting proper noun, such as "Sed" at the beginning of a sentence.

With @type="transposition", it links a paragraph (first teidata.pointer in the value) of the manuscript text to an 'ancho'r (second teidata.pointer in the value) marking the point of the text in which that paragraph is collocated
by both the editions of Garufi and Bonetti (if @subtype="garufiandbonetticollocation"),
by Garufi only (if @subtype="garuficollocation"), or
by Bonetti only (if @subtype="bonetticollocation")

list.item: With @type="bonetti_is_collation_exemplar_from_here_on" it marks the point of the text rom which I used the file with the OCR of the Bonetti edition as a collation base. Before that point, I had used the OCR of the Garufi edition as base.
With @type="no-par-break-in-bonetti-between-this-garufi-par-and-previous-one" and @ed="#b" it is put at a point of the text in which Garufi has a paragraph break but Bonetti does not.
With @type="bonetti-paragraph-break" and @ed="#b" it is put at a point of the text in which Bonetti has a paragraph break but Garufi does not.

namespace.tagUsage:
With @resp="#pm" (Paolo Monella) or @resp="#b" (Bonetti edition):
With @type="graphic": note on glyphs or graphemes.
With @type="segmentation": note on the text segmentation (arrangement of paragraphs or missing paragraphs).
With @type="textcrit": note on textual critical matters.
With @resp="#b" (Bonetti edition):
With @type="content": note on the text content.
With @type="year": note on the year in which a fact actually happened, according to C. Bonetti.
With @resp="#hand2" (the hand from the XVII century):
With @type="etcetera": a note handwritten by hand2 on the manuscript reporting the first words of the portion of the text that is supposed to follow a marginal or footer addition by hand2. The note normally ends with "et cetera…"
With @type="sanctipetri": a note handwritten by hand2 on the manuscript saying that a marg or footer note has been taken by manuscript ("codex sancti Petri").
With @type="textcrit": note on textual critical matters.
Exclusively used in cases such as: Sanctum Nicolaum, qui dicitur "ad litus".
Sometimes a title consists in the first words of a hymn, such as "te deum laudamus".

handNote.p: A part of the text was missing from manuscript A, so two additional folios were added at a much later time, probably in the XVII century, and then numbered as 204 and 205.
A marginal note at the top right corner of folio 204r says: "hae duo paginae, quae hic deerant, desumptae sunt de codices Petri de Urbe".
So pages 204r, 204v, 205r, 205v do not constitute a witness of the text of codex A. Still, I am transcribing their text here for completeness.
This hand is also responsible for corrections and additions passim in the manuscript.

Also this hand has a glyph for the 'e caudatum'. Since this is an alphabetic (not graphematic )transcription, I am encoding it with its alphabetic correspondent 'ae' and marking those 'ae' alphabemes with seg ana="#ae".

text.body: [p xml:id="b062heading"] [/p] [p xml:id="g163.6-163.7"] Anni domini DCCCLXXXXIV. Primus Guaymarius suscepit principatum in Salerno, et regnauit annis XXXIX. [/p] [p xml:id="g163.8-163.10"] Anno dominice incarnationis CMII. Urbs Tauromenis a Sarracenis capta est. Eodem anno in nocte uisi sunt igniculi in modum stellarum per aera discurrentes: qua nocte rex Africe residens super Consentiam Calabrie ciuitatem, Dei iudicio, mortuus est. [/p] [p xml:id="g163.11-164.9"] Anno dominice incarnationis CMVI. Carolus Francorum rex qui Simplex est dictus, obiit anno regni eius XXVII, post cuius mortem quidam Rodulfus, annitente Robberto principe, regnum Francorum arripuit iniuste tenuitque annis XIII. Sub hoc itaque Rodulfo Ugo Robberti filius post patris obitum nomen Abbatis sumpsit. Mortuo autem rege Rodulfo Ludouicus Caroli Simplicis filius transactis puerilibus annis est iure unctus in regem. Post hec Francorum proceres instinctu Ugonis Abbatis rebellauerunt contra regem Ludouicum. Et ipso anno facta est fames ualida per totum regnum Francorum ita ut modius frumenti uenumdaretur solidos XXIV. Eodem quoque anno mense Maio sanguis pluit super operarios. Hac itaque tempestate Otto non tam suggestione Saxonum quam et quorumdam faccione Francorum, maxime quidem Ugonis Abbatis, unctus est in regem Saxonie. Interea apud Constantinopolim mortuis Leone et Alexandro imperatoribus Constantinus eiusdem Leonis filius suscepit imperium, regnauitque annis sex. [/p] [p xml:id="g164.10-164.11"] Anni domini CMXIII, defuncto Constantino imperatore Romano, Heliopolitanus Constantinopolitanum suscepit imperium tenuitque annis XXV. [/p] [p xml:id="g164.12-164.19"] Inter hec Formosus Romane sedis episcopus moritur et successit ei Bonifacius, sedit annis XII. Quo defuncto Stephanus ei successit in sede pontificali; qui post anno I et mensibus II uita decedens sedem dereliquit Romano episcopo qui sedit mensibus III. Defuncto autem Romano Theodorus sedit dies XX. Post hec uero Iohannes sedit annis II. Cui successit Benedictus papa qui sedit annis III. Huic successit Leo et sedit mense I. Post quem Chistoforus mensibus VI sedit. Hic eiectus de papatu monachus factus est, et Sergius in sede pontificali constitutus qui sedit annis VII mensibus III. Post cuius obitum Anastasius sedit annis II mensibus II. [/p] [p xml:id="g164.19-164.25"] Eodem anno Landulfus princeps Beneuenti preliatus est cum Ursileone patricio Grecorum in Apulia eumque uicit. At uero in Gallia Ludouicus Francorum rex captus est a Nordmannis dolo Ugonis Abbatis, qui postea dictus est Magnus, multis Francorum interfectis, qui rex totum tempus uite sue plenum ducens angustiarum et tribulationum diem clausit extremum anni domini CMXXII, sepultusque Remis in basilica Sancti Remigii. Hic autem duos liberos superstites reliquit, Lotharium atque Carolum, quos ex Giberga Ottonis Saxonum regis sorore genuerat. Defuncto igitur Ludouico Lotharius filius eius adhuc iuuenis unctus est in regem Remis et Ugo Magnus dux eius factus est. [/p] [p xml:id="g165.1-165.3"] Anni domini CMXXIII Anastasio papa defuncto, dando Romanum suscepit pontificatum seditque mensibus VI. Quo defuncto Iohannes sedem papalem sedit annis XIV mensibus II. [/p] [p xml:id="g165.4-165.7"] Anno dominice incarnationis CMXXVI, uenerunt Sclaui in Apuliam et ciuitatem Sipontum hostili direptione et gladio uastauerunt. Non post multum uero temporis Ungri uenerunt in Apuliam et capta Aerea ciuitate ceperunt Tarentum. Dehinc Campaniam ingressi non modicam ipsius prouincie partem igni ac direptioni dederunt. [/p] [p xml:id="g165.8-165.9"] Anni Domini CMXXXIII, alius Gisolfus factus est princeps in Salerno uixitque in principatu annis XLVIII. [/p] [p xml:id="g165.10-166.2"] Anni Domini CMXXXIX, Constantinus cum filio Constantino apud Constantinopolim post Romano Heliopolitanum cepit imperare, regnaueruntque annis XVI. Post quos filius eiusdem Constantini Romano cum filio suo Basilio annis III imperauit, et post eos Niceforus imperauit annis VI. His autem temporibus Ungri secundo ingressi sunt in Apuliam eamque optinuerunt annis IX. [/p] [p xml:id="g166.3-166.8"] Inter hec quoque Iohanne papa defuncto, Leo papa sedit mensibus VI. Cui successit Stephanus qui sedit annis II mense I. Huic uero Iohannes successit et sedit annis IV mensibus X. Hic autem fuit filius Sergii pape. Igitur Iohanni successit Leo qui sedit annis IV mensibus VI. Post quem Stephanus sedit annis III mensibus IV. Cui Marinus successit seditque in pontificatu Romano annis III mensibus VI. Quo uita decedente Agapitus sedit annis X mensibus VII. Huic itaque Iohannes successit, sedit annis nouem mensibus tribus. [/p] [p xml:id="g166.9-166.25"] Anno dominice incarnationis CMLIV, corpus beati Mathei apostoli et euangeliste de Pestana ciuitate Bricie in Salernum translatum est, principante tunc in eadem ciuitate Gisulfo. At uero in Gallia Carolus frater Lotharii Francorum regis euo iunior priuatis in rebus senuit. Fuerant autem Ugoni Magno filii Otto et Ugo atque Enricus, nati ex filia Ottonis regis Saxonum. Defuncto itaque Ugone Magno, successit ei Otto filius eius qui non post multum temporis mortuus est, et Ugo frater eius effectus est dux Francorum regis, Enricus quoque effectus est dux regis Burgundionum. Non post multos uero dies Lotharius rex Francorum congregans exercitum ualde copiosum renouauit in dicione sua Lotharium regnum. Quod audiens Otto Saxonum rex qui Aquisgrani tunc commanebat, relicto palatio quod sibi uendicauerat, fugiit. Post hec Otto rex congregans exercitum suum uenit Parisius, ubi interfectus est nepos illius cum aliis quam pluribus ad portam ciuitatis, incenso suburbio illius. Lotharius igitur rex tribus diebus et tribus noctibus constanter persequens illos usque ad fluuium qui fluit iuxta Ardennam, interfecta hostium multitudine cum uictoria in Franciam reuersus est. Post hec non apposuit ultra Otto rex ut ueniret in Franciam. In ipso autem anno Lotharius rex consilio Ugonis ducis sui pacificatus est cum Ottone rege Remis ciuitate, deditque Lotharius rex Ottoni regi in beneficio Lotharium regnum in anno. anno dominice incarnationis CMLXIII. [/p] [p xml:id="g167.1-167.3"] Sequente uero anno idem Otto Saxonum rex Romam uenit nobiliter cum exercitu et a Iohanne papa coronatus est, accipiens ab eo totius Italie uexillum cum imperii dignitate, professus iureiurando seruare fidem Romane ecclesie. Ex tunc itaque Otto rex appellatus est imperator. [/p] [p xml:id="g167.4-168.4"] Anno dominice incarnationis CMLXVII, hic in Apuliam uenit cum exercitu et oppidum Barum expugnando cepit, cepitque ciuitatem Bibinum atque Asculum, Grecos expellens. Interea apud Constantinopolim defuncto imperatore Niceforo, Iohannes cognomento Simiski tenuit imperium annis VI. Quo defuncto Basilius et Constantinus filii eius ceperunt imperare ab anno incarnationis domini CMLXX , regnaueruntque annis LV. At uero Rome defuncto Iohanne papa Benedictus papa sedit annis II, et post eum Leo sedit annis VI mensibus XI. Hic a Petro prefecto Romane urbis comprehensus et in castello sancti Angeli retrusus, deinde in Campaniam in exilium missus et post menses decem Romam reuersus est, et de persecutoribus eius ab Ottone imperatore in urbe Roma supplicium sumptum est. Iste quoque papa Iohannes coronam posuit imperii Ottoni imperatori, quique accepta corona Aquisgranum reuersus est. Hic etiam papa Iohannes nobilitauit Capuam archiepiscopatu, in qua ciuitate tunc principabatur Pandulfus cognomento Capudferreus. Eodem tempore Sarraceni uenerunt in Apuliam et expugnauerunt ciuitatem Grauinam eamque ceperunt. Hinc quoque secundo anno post hec ceperunt ciuitatem Bibinum ignique combusserunt. [/p]
